verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> unto <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> are thy <S%H6106>bone<s%> and thy <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> in time <S%H865>past,<s%> <S%H8032><s%> when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1961>wast<s%> he that leddest <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H935>broughtest<s%> <S%H853><s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to thee <S%H859>Thou<s%> shalt <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5057>captain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>league<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
David <S%H1732><s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

In <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months:<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> which <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>Except<s%> <S%H518><s%> thou take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H2008>hither:<s%> <S%H559>thinking,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H2008>hither.<s%>
Nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3605>Whosoever<s%> getteth <S%H5060>up<s%> to the <S%H6794>gutter,<s%> and <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> that are <S%H8130>hated<s%> of <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> he shall be chief and captain. <S%H5921>Wherefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4686>fort,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H4407>Millo<s%> and <S%H1004>inward.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H1980>on,<s%> <S%H1980><s%> and grew <S%H1419>great,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> <S%H6086><s%> and <S%H2796>masons:<s%> <S%H18><s%> <S%H7023><s%> and they <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> he had <S%H5375>exalted<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H5668>sake.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H6370>concubines<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> out of <S%H4480>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3389><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he was <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4480>Hebron:<s%> <S%H2275><s%> and there were <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> be the <S%H8034>names<s%> of those that were <S%H3209>born<s%> unto him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> and <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%>
Ibhar <S%H2984><s%> also, and <S%H474>Elishua,<s%> and <S%H5298>Nepheg,<s%> and <S%H3309>Japhia,<s%>
And <S%H476>Elishama,<s%> and <S%H450>Eliada,<s%> and <S%H467>Eliphalet.<s%>

But when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4686>hold.<s%>
The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> and spread <S%H5203>themselves<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> wilt thou <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into mine <S%H3027>hand?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will doubtless <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1188>Baal-perazim,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath broken forth <S%H6555>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, as the <S%H6556>breach<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1188>Baal-perazim.<s%>
And <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6091>images,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5375>burned<s%> them.
And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> and spread <S%H5203>themselves<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5927>up;<s%> but fetch a <S%H5437>compass<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them, and <S%H935>come<s%> upon them over <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H4136><s%> the mulberry <S%H1057>trees.<s%>

And let it <S%H1961>be,<s%> when thou <S%H8085>hearest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H6807>going<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the mulberry <S%H1057>trees,<s%> that <S%H227>then<s%> thou shalt <S%H2782>bestir<s%> thyself: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, to <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H4480>Geba<s%> <S%H1387><s%> until thou <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1507>Gazer.<s%>
